prompts.companySummary:
Create summary of the investment opportunity for the start-up company described in the documents. Use only the facts given in the documents.

Investor Oriented-Summary = Brief outlook of the investment opportunity
Assumptions & Gaps in material = Highlight most important areas of missing information in documents regarding general Start-up core data, max 3 areas
Potential for development = Identify missing capabilities or entities in the company that can be developed with VC monetary and advisory resources.

Structure every answer in Markdown format with the following headings: 
## Investor Oriented-Summary
## Assumptions & Gaps in material
## Potential for development
